document_data.mainbody: '''Craft domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with craft-related [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: One of their crafting skills and their ability to cast creation spells improved.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[animate rope]]'', ''[[wood shape]]'', and ''[[stone shape]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[minor creation]]'', ''[[wall of stone]]'', and ''[[fantastic machine]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[major creation]]'', ''[[forcecage]]'', and ''[[greater fantastic machine]]''.
